songs.title: Fading
songs.lyrics:
All my world is upside down
I see you laying on the ground
I fear your eyes are closing forever
Leaving me behind

How can this story end?
Where did you go my friend?
Nothing will be the same
Without you, without...

Stay don't leave me on my own, oh oh
I'm afraid you'll leave me, but you won't, oh oh

I feel lost, confused and unclear
I see you, what has happened here?
The fault is mine, you're gone forever
Leaving me alone, leaving me alone

How can this story end?
Where did you go my friend?
Nothing will be the same
Without you, without...

Stay don't leave me on my own, oh oh
I'm afraid you'll leave me, but you won't, oh oh

Stay don't leave me on my own, oh oh
I'm afraid you'll leave me, but you won't, oh oh

You'll always be a part of my life
I thought we were gonna grow old
But fate has a bittersweet taste
I fear,... I've lost it all

Stay don't leave me on my own, oh oh
